2097610.name: Puzzling Wild DLC - 400 extra puzzle pack
2097610.description:
This puzzle pack has 400 extra puzzles for the game Puzzling Wild IQ Test. When you download this DLC just restart the game and you will be able to access these 400 extra puzzles in the settings menu.

Think the first 400 puzzles were too easy? These extra 400 puzzles will give you more of a challenge.
2097610.supported_languages: 英语, 法语, 意大利语, 德语, 西班牙语 - 西班牙, 阿拉伯语, 保加利亚语, 捷克语, 丹麦语, 荷兰语, 芬兰语, 希腊语, 匈牙利语, 日语, 韩语, 挪威语, 波兰语, 罗马尼亚语, 俄语, 简体中文, 瑞典语, 泰语, 土耳其语, 乌克兰语, 越南语
